metadata.titleEn: Geochemical data set of late Early Cretaceous granites in NIMA area, central Tibet
metadata.titleCn: 西藏中部尼玛地区早白垩世晚期花岗岩地球化学数据集
metadata.description: The data in this paper include major and trace elements, zircon U-Pb ages and HF isotopes, and detrital zircon U-Pb ages. The samples were collected from basalt and andesite in the Salt Lake area of Western Tibet. Zircon U-Pb geochronology, zircon trace and zircon Hf isotope data were obtained by laser ablation inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry. The major and trace geochemical data of the whole rock are obtained by X-ray fluorescence spectrometry and inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry. The age, origin and formation background of magmatism in the region can be defined by the data obtained.
metadata.descriptionCn: 本文数据包含火山岩的全岩主量元素和微量元素、锆石U–Pb年龄和Hf同位素数据和碎屑锆石U-Pb年龄数据。样品采集自西藏西部盐湖地区的玄武岩和安山岩。锆石U-Pb年代学、锆石微量和锆石Hf同位素数据是通过激光剥蚀-电感耦合等离子体质谱仪获得的。岩石全岩主微量地球化学数据是通过X荧光光谱仪和电感耦合等离子体质谱仪分析获得的。通过获得的数据，结合已有文献数据资料，可以限定区域内岩浆作用的时代、成因和形成背景。
metadata.instructions: All data are stored in Excel file: the file name is upb.xls, which represents radioisotope U-Pb data; Zirt.xls represents zircon trace data, and wrmt.xls represents whole rock major and trace geochemical data; Hf.xls represents Hf isotopic data of zircon
metadata.instructionsCn: 所有数据以Excel文件存储：文件名为UPb.xls代表放射性同位素U-Pb数据；文件名为ZirT.xls代表锆石微量数据，文件名为WRMT.xls代表全岩主微量地球化学数据；Hf.xls代表锆石Hf同位素数据

literatureList.titleEn: Tetrad effect of rare earth elements caused by fractional crystallization in high-silica granites: An example from central Tibet
literatureList.referenceEn: Shuai, X., Li, S.-M., Zhu, D.-C., Wang, Q., Zhang, L.-L., & Zhao, Z. (2021). Tetrad effect of rare earth elements caused by fractional crystallization in high-silica granites: An example from central Tibet. Lithos, 384-385, 105968. Retrieved from http://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S0024493721000049. doi:https://doi.org/10.1016/j.lithos.2021.105968

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the features and methods used in collecting geochemical and isotopic data from volcanic rock samples in the context of early Cretaceous granites in central Tibet?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 在早白垩世中央藏区的花岗岩样品中收集地球化学和同位素数据所使用的特征和方法包括：
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: whole-rock major and trace elements, zircon U–Pb ages, Hf isotopic data, laser ablation-inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry, X-ray fluorescence spectrometry, inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 全岩主量和微量元素，锆石U-Pb年龄，Hf同位素数据，激光剥蚀-电感耦合等离子体质谱法，X射线荧光光谱法，电感耦合等离子体质谱法

Definition.QuestionEn: What are '锆石U–Pb年龄和Hf同位素数据' and how are they collected in the context of geochemical datasets?
Definition.QuestionCn: '锆石U–Pb年龄和Hf同位素数据'是指通过测定锆石矿物中的铀（U）和铅（Pb）同位素的比率来确定其年龄，以及测定锆石中铥（Hf）同位素的组成来获取其来源和演化信息。这些数据通常通过质谱分析技术收集，常见的方法包括激光剥蚀-电感耦合等离子体质谱（LA-ICP-MS）和锆石U-Pb年龄测定的化学分离和质谱分析。
Definition.AnswerEn: '锆石U–Pb年龄和Hf同位素数据' refer to zircon U–Pb ages and Hf isotope data, which are collected using laser ablation-inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry. These data types help in determining the age and isotopic composition of zircon minerals, providing insights into the timing and nature of geological processes.
Definition.AnswerCn: “锆石U–Pb年龄和Hf同位素数据”是指使用激光剥蚀-电感耦合等离子体质谱法收集的锆石U–Pb年龄和Hf同位素数据。这些数据类型有助于确定锆石矿物的年龄和同位素组成，为了解地质过程的时间和性质提供了见解。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What underlying geological processes can be inferred from the geochemical data patterns of volcanic rocks collected from the Nyima region in central Tibet during the late Early Cretaceous?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 从在晚早白垩世收集的来自西藏中部Nyima地区的火山岩的地球化学数据模式中，可以推断出哪些潜在的地质过程。
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The geochemical data patterns of volcanic rocks, including whole-rock major and trace elements, zircon U-Pb ages, and Hf isotopes, suggest information about the magmatic activity and its origins in the Nyima region. By analyzing these patterns, researchers can infer the age, genesis, and tectonic setting of magmatic activities, providing insights into the geological processes at play during the late Early Cretaceous period. The combination of zircon U-Pb geochronology and Hf isotopic compositions allows for detailed interpretations of crustal evolution and magma source characteristics.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 火山岩的地球化学数据模式，包括全岩主要和微量元素、锆石U-Pb年龄和Hf同位素，提供了关于Nyima地区岩浆活动及其起源的信息。通过分析这些模式，研究人员可以推断出岩浆活动的年龄、成因和构造背景，从而深入了解晚早白垩世期间的地质过程。锆石U-Pb年代学与Hf同位素组成的结合，使得对地壳演化和岩浆源特征的详细解释成为可能。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What causes variations in the accuracy of geochemical data collection methods for volcanic rock samples in the central Tibet region during the Late Early Cretaceous?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 导致中央西藏地区晚早白垩世火山岩样品地球化学数据采集方法准确性变化的原因是什么？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Variations in the accuracy of geochemical data collection methods may be caused by the techniques used, such as laser ablation-inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry for zircon U-Pb dating and isotope analysis, and X-ray fluorescence and inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry for whole-rock geochemistry. The challenges also stem from the geological complexity of the region, the preservation state of the samples, and the calibration and precision of the instruments used.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 地球化学数据采集方法的准确性差异可能由所使用的技术造成，例如激光剥蚀-电感耦合等离子体质谱法用于锆石U-Pb定年和同位素分析，以及X射线荧光和电感耦合等离子体质谱法用于全岩地球化学。此外，挑战还源于该地区的地质复杂性、样品的保存状态以及所使用仪器的校准和精度。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the potential outcomes on the understanding of magmatic activity in a region when using laser ablation-inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry (LA-ICP-MS) for zircon U-Pb dating and Hf isotopic data collection?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 使用激光剥蚀-电感耦合等离子体质谱法（LA-ICP-MS）进行锆石U-Pb定年和Hf同位素数据收集时，对一个地区的岩浆活动理解的潜在结果是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Using LA-ICP-MS for zircon U-Pb dating and Hf isotopic data collection can lead to a more precise understanding of the timing, origin, and tectonic setting of magmatic activity in the region. By providing accurate age determinations and isotopic compositions, researchers can better constrain the geological history and processes that have shaped the area, including the nature of magma sources and the evolution of the crust.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 使用LA-ICP-MS进行锆石U-Pb定年和Hf同位素数据收集，可以更精确地理解该地区岩浆活动的时间、来源和构造背景。通过提供准确的年龄测定和同位素组成，研究人员可以更好地限制地质历史和塑造该地区的过程，包括岩浆源的性质和地壳的演化。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What procedures are used to collect and analyze zircon U-Pb ages and Hf isotopic data in the context of geochemical studies of granitic rocks?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 在花岗岩岩石的地球化学研究中，收集和分析锆石U-Pb年龄和Hf同位素数据的程序包括以下步骤：
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: Zircon U-Pb ages and Hf isotopic data are collected using laser ablation-inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry (LA-ICP-MS). This involves using a laser to sample zircon crystals and analyze their isotopic composition with a mass spectrometer, allowing researchers to determine the age and isotopic characteristics of the samples.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 锆石U-Pb年龄和Hf同位素数据是通过激光剥蚀-电感耦合等离子体质谱法（LA-ICP-MS）收集的。这涉及使用激光对锆石晶体进行取样，并利用质谱仪分析其同位素组成，从而使研究人员能够确定样品的年龄和同位素特征。
